Package ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.recordbook

Class RecordBook

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.recordbook.internal.AcademicProgressEvaluator
ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.recordbook.RecordBook
public class RecordBook extends AcademicProgressEvaluator
An immutable class which contains information about student's record book, including name, university, recordBookNumber and speciality. The main purpose of this class is to evaluate information about student's academic performance (AcademicProgressEvaluator is responsible for this) and make some general conclusions about results of his study (e.g. hasScholarshipNow(), diplomaGradePointAverage(), redDiplomaPossible(), AcademicProgressEvaluator.currentSemesterNumber).

More local information about each semester grades or final grades may be recieved by SemesterGradesTable methods, whose instance is returned by respectively AcademicProgressEvaluator.semesterGrades and AcademicProgressEvaluator.finalGrades.

See Also:

  • Mark
  • SemesterGradesTable

      public static RecordBook fromJson(File file) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.exc.StreamReadException, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DatabindException, IOException
      Returns an instance of RecordBook corresponding to JSON data supplied by file.
      Parameters:
      file - a JSON file with record book information
      Returns:
      an instance of this class
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if file contains contradictory fields
      IOException - if file can't be accessed
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.exc.StreamReadException - if error during parsing occured
      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DatabindException - if error during parsing occured

    • hasScholarshipNow

      public boolean hasScholarshipNow()
      Returns if a student whose academic perfomance is reflected by this record book is getting scholarship at current semester. Indeed, the result is true if there weren't "fail", 2 or 3 marks in the previous semester, or this semester is first.
      Returns:
      true if a student gets scholarship

    • diplomaGradePointAverage

      public double diplomaGradePointAverage()
      Returns the current grade point average of a diploma.
      Returns:
      current grade point average of a diploma

    • redDiplomaPossible

      public boolean redDiplomaPossible()
      Returns if a student whose academic perfomance is reflected by this record book is able to graduate with a red diploma. It means that at least 75% of final marks are fives or "passes" and all the rest are fours.
      Returns:
      true if red diploma is possible
